snippet: Two 20-foot-deep pits opened in western South Dakota on Monday to help dispose of thousands of cattle carcasses piling up since an early October blizzard decimated herds.
abstract: Two 20-foot-deep pits are opened in western South Dakota to help dispose of thousands of cattle carcasses piling up since early October blizzard decimated herds.
lead_paragraph: Two 20-foot-deep pits opened in western South Dakota on Monday to help dispose of thousands of cattle carcasses piling up since an early October blizzard decimated herds.

headline.main: South Dakota: Disposal Begins for Thousands of Cattle
headline.print_headline: South Dakota: Disposal Begins For Thousands of Cattle
